metadata.title: Putting Feelings Into a Moment, Part 2

tracks.text: UniteRounds
Sunraku and Katzo Tataki look at each other
In a flashback, Setsuna turns to the party
She bows.
Silhouettes of Towa, Kei, Rakuro and Rei stand in front of portraits of their SLF characters Pencilgon, Oikatzo, Sunraku, and Psyger-0.
Text, Original Work, Katarina, Ryosuke Fuji. Serialized by Kodansha in Weekly Shounen Magazine
Rakuro wears a VR headset. The ID Shard, a diamond shaped pendant, swings in darkness.
Thirdrema, a western style town, stands at the foot of a hill with a castle at the top.
The sun sets and day turns to night.
Text, Shangri-La Frontier
Rakuro turns into Sunraku, who wields twin marsh daggers
Red water gurgles
Pencilgon descends to the ground and strikes with a spear
Katzo draws a red fist and black fist together, and her fists burst crimson.
Emul, Elke, Vash, Bilac, and Peitz walk along the Rabbituza palace verandah.
Psyger-0 and Psyger-100 stand back to back in a board room
Setsuna walks. Beyond her is the gnarled tree, high cliffs, and full moon.
Wethermon, a metal samurai, stares at us with glowing eyes. Fire licks his arms, shoulders, and stomach.
A metal horse rears in front of a red moon
A golden Reward Scales shift
Sunraku holds a two handed long sword and strikes at shadowy ghouls that surround him in a misty, purple forest.
Dozens of shadowy figures stand on outcroppings. Their eyes glow red.
Pencilgon swings a spear in mist
A headless horse and horseman gallop. She strikes
Katzo does a flying back flip over skeletal monsters
Wethermon draws a sword. The moon reflects in a muddy puddle. A drop splashes. Psyger-0 holds a sword, her long red plume blowing in the wind.
In a library, a girl with long pink braids and wide, green eyes smiles widely and reaches out a hand.
The Rebirth Tearjewel lands on Sunraku's abs and glows
Sunraku grips a curved dagger. Wearing a beetle helmet and diamond shaped pendant, he runs forward. Katzo with red fists and Pencilgon with a spear run with him.
In slow motion, they approach the samurai. The world turns red.
Text, 16, Putting Feelings into a Moment, Part 2
In the field of red spider lillies, Pencilgon looks at an item list
Wethermon combo lunge strikes Sunraku
He cuts Sunraku almost in half. Sunraku's HP drops to 0
Katzo pitches a Rebirth Tearjewel at Sunraku.
He opens his eyes
Full health. He jumps to his feet.
Wethermon eyes Katzo
He swings. She dodges, narrowly.
He equips a pair of marsh daggers
He strikes Wethermon in the back
Wethermon strikes at Sunraku, who dodges.
Wethermon raises his sword high
The sword crackles with electricity
He brings his sword down.
Sunraku runs, dodging lightning strikes
Wethermon raises a fist
A cloud stretches from his arm, forming a giant hand.
The cloud palm gets closer, reaching out
The hand swats him, and he falls to the ground under the weight of a hurricane.
His HP drops to 0.
Katzo winds up and pitches another Rebirth Tearjewel
Katzo runs in, Wethermon swings, Katzo dodges, turns, and pulls back a fist, and punches. Wethermon cuts her in half from behind.
Pencilgon pitches a Tearjewel
It lands on Katzo.
Sunraku runs with daggers
Wethermon strikes with a lightning coated sword. Sunraku dodges.
Swipe parry swipe parry swipe contact
Pencilgon pitches a tearjewel
Sunraku sits up
Pencilgon holds the Reward scales,. She draws a line with her hand and, the left side of the pan turns green. She throws a Tearjewel at Katzo
Wethermon's elbows and chest plates begin to steam. He slows and creaks to a hunched position.
Sunraku holds daggers
Wethermon readies his sword
An inky, black magic circle forms in the air above them.
Her head is even with its knees. The robot horse has steam valves in its cheeks, cables for a tail, and metal scales armoring its body, with stripes on one side.
The horse rears. She stares, eyes wide.
Label, Tactical Mount, Kirin
Kirin stomps where Katzo stands. She runs, flying from the blast wave, but recovers and runs.
Missile silos lining Kirin's spine open and fire
Katzo dodges right left right slow left
Kirin rears, and its tail cables fire laser shots.
She jumps and climbs up the ladder.
Kirin bucks her, and she holds on by the whip
In Thirdrema, an ornate building is labeled The Golden Scales.
Offering Dish, 30,002,310 mahni
Choose your perk
She presses More Stat Points
Their stat points grow. Sunraku and Katzo glow gold
He glances at his stat screen, then at Pencilgon, who smiles.
He unequips his marsh daggers
Sunraku punches, his hand glowing blue. Wethermon draws his sword. Sunraku punches the hilt, and the sword goes flying.
He runs behind Wethermon, leaps
and grabs the sword
The whip snaps. Katzo goes flying.
A shadow falls over Sunraku
Wethermon lunges and swipes. Sunraku dodges.
She runs, Wethermon lunges.
He strikes Wethermon's head
Wethermon grabs Sunraku from behind and drives him into the ground. Sunraku's HP 0's out.
Wethermon stands and turns to Pencilgon
She runs, sliding behind just as the attack begins.
She tosses a Tearjewel as Sunraku begins to dissintegrate
He jumps up and away from Wethermon.
Wethermon turns to look at Pencilgon and Sunraku
Wethermon takes a quick draw stance.
Sunraku side steps the sword and strikes Wethermon. Wethermon slices again. Sunraku dodges and leaps back.
57 seconds left
Kirin shakes its head. Pencilgon looks. Katzo has tied herself to Kirin's face.
0 seconds
Kirin stops.
Wethermon stops and looks up.
His eyes flicker.
He shakes and falls to his knees.
He holds his sword and hangs his head.
The tree shakes in the breeze.
Sakura petals drifting around the barren field and across the photo negative sky.
Cracks form in Wethermon's helmet.
Pencilgon stares. Sunraku holds marsh daggers. Katzo is tied and upside down.
She smiles
Saint's Holy Water
The blue, jeweled vase cracks over Wethermon, coating him in glowing, turquoise liquid. Steam pours from cracks.
He screams. Fade to white.
Text, 21, The day starts early for a trash game hunter
Text, Why are you up so early?
What is Moody Music Adventure?
What are you doing?
